name: Documentation Updater
description: Updates documentation when source files change

action.prompt:
Source files have been modified in this TypeScript/React project. Please review the changes and update the documentation accordingly:

1. Update the main README.md file to reflect any new features, components, or architectural changes
2. If there's a /docs folder, update relevant documentation files there as well
3. Ensure documentation covers:
   - New components or features added
   - Changes to existing functionality
   - Updated installation or usage instructions
   - Any breaking changes or migration notes
   - Performance improvements or optimizations

Focus on keeping documentation accurate, helpful, and up-to-date with the current codebase. Include code examples where appropriate and maintain consistency with the existing documentation style.
